nodes.text: Asani was a female Human Corporal of the Galactic Republic living during the revolt against the Eternal Empire. Following the Battle of Asylum she traveled to Odessen and joined the Alliance. Asani was assigned to the military branch of the Alliance under former Republic Admiral Bey'wan Aygo, where she frequently clashed with Private Schor over their former affiliations. She was present on the planet Umbara during the Crisis on Umbara.
Corporal Asani appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Fallen Empire in the Alliance base on Odessen.
